con:interface.name: CIDM NEO Customer Attributes API

con:method.name: GET
con:method.con:description: Search Accounts based on one of email or account_id Search Accounts

con:parameter.con:name: email
con:parameter.con:description: Account Email address to search for

con:method.name: PUT
con:method.con:description:
Records that an Account has given consent to share their attributes to the given service in their current authentication session, or to update global sharing preference.
Records that an Account has given consent to share their attributes once to the given service in their current authentication session, or to update global sharing preference.

con:method.name: PUT
con:method.con:description:
Updates the Account Management Email for an existing Account for the given Account Partner and Key
Updates the Account Management Email for an existing Account for the given Account Partner and Key

con:method.name: PUT
con:method.con:description:
Records that an Account has stepped up their current authentication session
Records that an Account has stepped up their current authentication session

con:method.name: GET
con:method.con:description:
Retrieves a summary of the Events of the nominated type for the specified QID. Uses cases include retrieving the number of ChangePassword events in the last X hours
Retrieves a summary of usage for the given QID based on the given criteria

con:method.name: POST
con:method.con:description:
Creates records within the Neo EOI Database for a user starting a new Verification process with this EOI Provider.
Records the start of a new Verification Attempt

con:method.name: GET
con:method.con:description:
If the Customer has an existing in progress verification that is still valid (not expired) this retrieves a new session token that will allow the resumption of the Verification Process
Retrieves an existing in progress verification if available

con:method.name: POST
con:method.con:description:
Registers that a single document verification attempt has been completed. This event will indicate either success or fail for a given document.
Records the progress of an existing Verification Attempt

con:method.name: POST
con:method.con:description:
Registers that a document verification process has failed. This event will indicate that the user has chosen to abort the verification or that the provider has rejected any further document verification attempts
Records the progress of an existing Verification Attempt

con:method.name: POST
con:method.con:description:
Registers that a document verification process has finished. This event will indicate that the provider has deemed the verification complete.
Records the progress of an existing Verification Attempt

con:method.name: GET
con:method.con:description:
Returns the list of available Event Types that will be accepted for creating and searching events.
Returns the list of available Event Types

con:method.name: POST
con:method.con:description:
Submits a new Event to be processed asynchronously by the API
Submits a new Event to the NEO API

con:method.name: PUT
con:method.con:description:
Creates or updatesrecords within the Neo application for a user being created/updated from Auth0.
Updates (or creates) an Account and Identity mapping within the Neo application

con:method.name: POST
con:method.con:description:
Creates records within the Neo application for a user being migrated from the CIDM classic.
Creates an identity mapping within the Neo application for an existing user

con:method.name: GET
con:method.con:description:
Retrieves an existing Identity for the Partner ID and Partner Key
Retrieves an existing identity for the given Partner and Key

con:method.name: GET
con:method.con:description:
Retrieves an existing Identity for the QID
Retrieves an existing identity for the given QID

con:method.name: DELETE
con:method.con:description:
Removes an existing Identity for the Partner ID and Partner Key
Removes an existing identity for the given Partner and Key

con:method.name: PUT
con:method.con:description:
Updates the Identity Management Mobile phone number an existing identity for the given Identity QID
Updates the Identity Management Mobile phone number an existing identity for the given Identity QID

con:parameter.con:name: authoritative_attributes
con:parameter.con:description: Comma separated list of Attribute Names that are required at an AUTHORITATIVE pedigree

con:parameter.con:name: self_asserted_attributes
con:parameter.con:description: Comma separated list of Attribute Names that are required at atleast a SELF_ASSERTED pedigree

con:parameter.con:name: sign
con:parameter.con:description: Boolean flag to indicate if all attributes should be signed

con:method.name: GET
con:method.con:description:
Retrieves the Events of the nominated type for the authenticated user. Supports view usage
Retrieves usage for the authenticated user based on the given criteria

con:parameter.con:name: event_categories
con:parameter.con:description: Comma separted list of event_categories to include.

con:parameter.con:name: event_types
con:parameter.con:description: Comma separted list of event_types to include

con:parameter.con:name: page_limit
con:parameter.con:description: Limits the number of returned items

con:method.name: GET
con:method.con:description:
Retrieves core Session based Identity Authententication details. Allows callers to determine if StepUp, EOI, or SharingPreferences is required prior to retrieving Attributes
Retrieves core Session based Identity Authententication details
